content: Top- Drawer! Well explanatory, I liked each point that is mentioned. I am still wondering how do I implement this when I already planned the launch for just 4 months ahead of April. I, in fact, see few hurdles to get through by August. So I have a question for you. I am yet to fix the development team, get connected with the NGO network and their respective cities, need to form a vendor based platform, and so on. My question is how do I implement each point covered in the blog. I have my steps listed to get the product launch though your list is in detail and vast.
